name: LOT Polish Airlines 787-8 [SP-LRF] Afternoon Takeoff from Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
What a nice surprise! Today, 2 LOT 787s came in to YYC, SP-LRF and SP-LRD, operating more charters for the RAF, along with an Atlas Air 747-400F. I missed the landing of all 3 of those, and, to my knowledge, SP-LRD and the 747-400F haven't departed yet. Sorry for the non-ideal viewpoint, he switched runways at the last minute (I was hoping to get a close up taxi shot, like with my Air Canada 777-200LR) and sent us spotters all over the place. Hope you enjoy, nonetheless!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: LOT Polish Airlines (LOT/LO)
Aircraft: Boeing 787-8 "Dreamliner"
Aircraft Name: "Franek"
Livery: New (2012- )
Engines: 2x RR Trent 1000
Registration: SP-LRF
Route: YYC-BZZ
Callsign: LOT 7462 Heavy
Runway used: 35L
Taxiway(s) used: JV, J, G, C
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/SPLRF
